maqras.text: 72|1|Ie,`watashi ni ko keiji sa reta. Ichidan no jin ga (kuruan o) kiite itta. “Watashi-tachi wa, hontoni odorokubeki dokuju o kiita.
72|2|Tadashi michi e no michibikidearu. Dakara watashi-tachi wa shinko shi, omoni nanimono o mo haisanai.
72|3|Songen ni shite ito takaki omo no o iko yo, kare wa tsuma o metorazu,-ko mo mota renai.
72|4|Watashi-tachi no naka no orokana mono ga, arra ni taishi tohomonai uso o hanashite ita.
72|5|Shikashi watashi-tachi wa, ningen mo Jin mo, arra ni tsuite uso o iubekide wa nai to kangaete ita.
72|6|Hontoni arushu no ningen wa, jin no aru mono ni higo o motomeru. Shikashi sore wa, kare-ra no guretsu o jocho shita.
72|7|Kare-ra mo anata gataga kangaeta yo ni, arra wa, nanimono mo yomigaera sa renaidarou to kangaete ita.
72|8|Watashi-tachi wa, ten (no himitsu) ni fureyou to shitaga, kore wa tsuyoi goei no moe kagayaku hoshi (ryusei) de ippaidearu koto ga wakatta.
72|9|Watashi-tachi wa (nusumi) kiku tame ni soko ni suwatte ita. Daga kikimimiwotateru-sha ni wa, keikai shite iru moe kagayaku hoshi (ryusei) ga machikamaete iru.
72|10|Watashi-tachi wa,-nushi ga chijo no mono ni taishite aku o nozoma rete iru no ka, matawa, kare-ra o tadashi michi ni, michibiku koto o nozoma rete iru no ka shiranakatta.
72|11|Watashi-tachi no nakaniha, tadashi mono mo iru ga,-sode wanai mono mo ite, samazamana michi ni shitagatte iru.
72|12|Daga watashi-tachi wa, chijo ni oite arra o dashinuku koto wa dekinaishi, mata tohi shite, kare o shippai sa seru koto mo dekinai to omotte iru.
72|13|Watashi-tachi wa michibiki o kiite, sugu sore o shinko shita. Soshite omo o shinjiru mono ni wa, osore mo naku, son'u koto mo naku, mata fusei ni au koto mo nai.
72|14|Watashi-tachi no nakaniha,(arra ni) fukuju, kie suru mono mo ari, mata seido kara hagureru mono mo iru. Fukuju, kie shita mono wa tadashi michi ni shiko o sadameru.
72|15|Daga seido kara hagureru mono wa hi goku no maki to narou. ” To.'
72|16|Mo shikare-ra ga (tadashi) michi o mamorunaraba, ware wa kanarazu yutakana ame (subete no onkei) o kare-ra ni megumu.
72|17|Ware wa sore ni yotte kare-ra o kokoromiyou. Daga omo o nen'u koto kara hagureru mono wa, kibishi chobatsu ni oitate rareru koto ni naru.
72|18|Hontoni masujido wa (subete) arra no yudearu. Sorede arra to doi ni hai shite hoka no mono ni inotte wa naranai.
72|19|Arra no shimo be (muhanmado) ga, kare ni inoru tame ni tatta toki, kare-ra (makka no tashinkyo to) wa dotto oshiyosen bakari ni, kare o torimaita.
72|20|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa, ichizu ni waga omoni inori, nani mo kare to doi ni haisanai.'
72|21|Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi ni wa, anata gata o gaishi tari, eki shi tari suru chikara wa nai nodearu.'
72|22|Itte yaru ga i. `Dare mo arra kara watashi o mamori kiru koto wa dekinaishi, mata kare no soto ni, hinansho o miidasu koto mo dekinai.
72|23|(Watashi wa) tada arra kara no o tsuge o, nobetsutaeru ni suginai. Sorede arra to sono shito ni shitagawanai mono, kare-ra ni wa jigoku no hi ga ari, eien ni sono naka ni sumudearou.'
72|24|Kare-ra wa, yakusoku sa reta koto o miru toki ni natte, joryoku ni oite dare ga mo tayori ni naranai ka,-su ni oite mo dare ga mottomo tayori ni naranai ka o shirudearou.
72|25|Gen tte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa, anata gata ni yakusoku sa reta koto ga chikadzuite iru no ka, soretomo arra ga mosukoshi kikan o moke rareta no ka o shiranai.
72|26|Kare (dake) ga yugen-kai o shitte ora re, sono himitsu o darenimo mo sa re wa shinai.
72|27|Kare no o ki ni meshita shito igai ni wa. Sorede, kare wa, mae kara mo ushirokara mo goei shite,(shito o) omomuka se rareta.
72|28|Sore wa kare-ra ga, hatashite omo no o tsuge o tsutaeta ka do ka o kare ga shira reru tamedeari, mata kare-ra no motsu mono o torikakonde, subete o sorezore keisan ni kazoeage rareru tamedearu.
73|1|I o atama kara matou mono (muhanmado) yo,
73|2|Yakan ni (reihai ni)-tate, sho toki o nozoite.
73|3|Yakan no hanbun, mata sore yori mo sukoshi chidjimete (reihai ni tate),
73|4|aruiwa, sore yori mo sukoshi oku reihai ni (tate), soshite yukkuri to shinchona choshi de, kuruan o yome.
73|5|Yagate ware wa, sochona o kotoba (kuruan) o anata ni kudasudearou.
73|6|Hontoni yakan (reihai) ni okiru koto wa, mottomo chikaradzuyoi ayumideari, okotoba o isso meikaku ni suru.
73|7|Hontoni anata wa, hiruma wa yomu de nagaku owa reru.
73|8|Sorede anata no omo no gyomei o 唱念 Shi, seikon o katamukete kare ni tsukae nasai.
73|9|Azuma to nishi no omode ara re, kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu. Sore de kare o, o tsuchi subeki ho to shite aogi nasai.
73|10|Kare-ra no iu koto o taeshinobi, kare-ra o hanare yo, rippa ni mi o kawase.
73|11|Gense no tomi ni azukatte uso-tsuki yobawari suru mono-tachi o ware ni yudanete, shibarakunoaida kare-ra o nao kumishi nasai,
73|12|hontoni ware no temoto ni wa kusari ga ari, mata hono mo aru.
73|13|(Nodo ni)-byo eru shokumotsu ga ari, mata itamashi chobatsu ga aru.
73|14|Sonohi, daichi to yamayama wa shindo shi, yamayama wa kuzure nagarete, suna no katamari ni narudearou.
73|15|Hontoni ware wa, anata gata no shonin to suru tame ni, shito o anata gata ni tsukawashita. Ware ga katsute, firuaun ni hitori no shito o okutta yo ni.
73|16|Daga firuaun wa sono shito ni shitagawanakattanode, ware wa kare o kibishiku basshite hametsu sa seta.
73|17|Moshi anata gataga izentoshite (arra o) kyohi surunara, kodomo ga (kyofu no amari) shiraga ni naru hi, anata gata wa doshite jibun o mamoreyou ka.
73|18|Sonohi, ten wa sake chirudearou. Kare no yakusoku wa, kanarazu kansui sa reru nodearu.
73|19|Hontoni kore wa kunkaidearu. Sore de nozomu mono ni,-nushi e no michi o tora se nasai.
